data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,715 believers find a person of peace today among the 709,384 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kohgiluyeh and Buyer Ahmad, Iran
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 3,715 believers in Kohgiluyeh and Buyer Ahmad to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who are far from you in Kohgiluyeh and Buyer Ahmad. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kohgiluyeh and Buyer Ahmad, Iran.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Mamasani people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, may the churches in Kohgiluyeh and Buyer Ahmad, Iran honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kohgiluyeh and Buyer Ahmad do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Kohgiluyeh and Buyer Ahmad, Iran a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
